name: GridTileBar
desc: A header used in a Material Design [GridTile].

fields.name: backgroundColor
fields.desc: The color to paint behind the child widgets.

fields.name: leading
fields.desc: A widget to display before the title.

fields.name: title
fields.desc: The primary content of the list item.

fields.name: subtitle
fields.desc: Additional content displayed below the title.

fields.name: trailing
fields.desc: A widget to display after the title.
